title: Help identifying font similar to meta
content:
Hello, I'm having some issues working this one out. Distinctive serifs, lowercase "g" and cap "M"

Thanks in advance  
J

Font: 

 BerlinMyriad-BlackCondensed

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200354/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
